explanation: [0-0] A red car is on a flight of stairs at the bottom of a mountain. The stairs ahead seem endless. There is a viewing platform halfway up the mountain, surrounded by lush greenery. The mountain is shrouded in dense fog.

[0-7] The car starts and heads up the mountain. The camera switches to an aerial view, showing many vehicles and people at the foot of the mountain. The camera switches again, showing the orange interior of the car. It then cuts back to the car, with its black roof and taillights shining as it sprints upwards.

[7-15] Next, the perspective shifts to beside the male driver, who is wearing a black helmet with a microphone attached. He steers the car, dashing towards a section of road with a median strip. The camera angle changes again, showing the car climbing onto a small platform, its front end momentarily suspended in the air before landing steadily and continuing its upward charge.
